channel.title: Flash's guide for Domination newbies... :: Digital Dilemma - Personal Tech, Projects and Software
channel.description: Written some time in the early 2000’s to try and encourage UT players into the Domination mod –Flash, 2025 Intended for them’s who can play UT, insta or nw, but who don’t know much about the DOM mod. Server Rules: (Normal CB stuff and what most clans use) 5 v 5. 20 mins per map. No score cap. 2 maps. FF = 0% WS = ON Redeemer = OFF Translocator = ON Intro: Dom is a great mod. A bit like defending in CTF. When played with nw then trans-whoring is essential and spam is rife - it’s by far the spammiest mod in UT. It’s non-stop action with lots of little tricks and has all the range of skill levels playing. All weapons have their place and the pace means you use what you’ve got.
